content.rendered:
Thank you LII for bringing the lost asset to my attention. As I live in another state, you were able to locate
me, cited the asset, answered my questions when I contacted you, and explained the process thoroughly.
You provided all the forms necessary. After a few steps on my own, the claim was submitted and
processed. I am very impressed by your process and professionalism. Thank you again.
